text: Terry Wilson may refer to: ==Sports== *Terry Wilson (Canadian football) (born c. 1942), Canadian footballer *Terry Wilson (footballer, born 1959), Scottish footballer (Hibernian FC, Dunfermline Athletic FC) *Terry Wilson (footballer, born 1969), Scottish footballer (Nottingham Forest FC) ==Others== *Terry Wilson (actor) (1923–1999), American actor *Terry Wilson (musician), American musician *Terry Wilson (scientist), Polar researcher *Terry Wilson (hate crime investigator) (born 1964), Canadian hate crime investigator *Terry Wilson (politician), American politician
title: Terry Wilson
